cs221.group15.pathfinder

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs221.group15.pathfinder.Route

  • public class Route
extends java.lang.Object
    The Route class will represent a Walking Tour. The route will consists of multiple waypoints. The waypoints will be stored in an array list of Waypoint objects waypoint.
    Since:
    0.1
    See Also:
    The Route will also be sent over the Internet to a web server where it will be stored and the tour will be viewable on a map; once the user is done recording the walk., HTTPPostSender

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getDistance()
      Returns the distance of a walking tour from start to finish and while going through all of the waypoints.
      float getHours()
      Returns the amount of time required to complete a walking tour in hours.

      Returns the walking tour's ID as a long.

      Returns the long description of the walking tour.

      Returns the title of the walking tour.

      Will return the number of waypoints in the walking tour.

      Will return a specified waypoint from the array.

      Sets the total distance of the walking tour in meters.

      Sets the amount of time the user takes to record the walking tour, by totaling up the time it takes to reach one way point to another.

      • setHours

        public void setHours(float hours)
        Sets the amount of time the user takes to record the walking tour, by totaling up the time it takes to reach one way point to another. The time is measured in hours.
        Parameters:
        hours - is the total amount of time to complete a walking tour as a float

      • setDistance

        public void setDistance(float distance)
        Sets the total distance of the walking tour in meters. This is done by getting the distances of one waypoint to another and getting the sum of them.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to be set for the Route
